mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_address, member_phone, branch_code) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberPhone}, #{branchCode})
mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id AS memberId, m.member_pw AS memberPw, m.member_name AS memberName, m.member_address AS memberAddress, m.member_phone AS memberPhone FROM member AS m JOIN management AS g ON m.branch_code = g.branch_code WHERE member_id = #{session.sessionId}
